00052 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 ///
00054 /// This bitmap has compressed and uncompressed data.
00055 /// Note: Transaction bitmaps are of this type
00056 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00058 
00059 public:
00060

00072     void AndCompOnly(const Bitmap &b1, const Bitmap &b2, int &CountAnds);

00074     int _compSize;   ///< in number of INTs
